name: 3.2.0 Release
body:
- Implement listCachedImages() for Glance V2 Images #1226
- Make all keystone v3 services (ProjectService, RoleService,..) work #1222
- Add support for “tags” of project which introduced in KeyStone v3.9 #1219
- Solves the issue #1198: "Identity service not working with OS4j". #1199
- neutron attach and detach network to agent dhcp #1082
- aodh-gnocchi alarm support #1130
- Fix for issue #979: Disable Gateway problem #1149
- Fix for issue #1124:openstack4j mistaken heat-cfn service as heat ser… #1142
- Heat service, adding support for stack abandon and adopt #1136
- Alarm test case fix #1209
- aodh-gnocchi alarm  support #1134
- Consider the SSLContext of an HttpRequest's Config object when using the Resteasy connector #1162
- Fix issue #1165. #1166
- Make sure the number of okhttp CLOSE_WAIT connections is always manageable #1151
- add loadbalancer_id to LbPoolV2Builder #1143
- Added SFC Service, all calls. #1141
- Better format used in toString method #1135
- Fix JSON deserialize bug cause by 'sessionPersistence' is abstract type #1127
- Add octavia error msg to ActionResponse #1140
- add vip_network_id and vip_port_id for lb post #1133
- Heat, add support for stack abandon and adopt #1135
- pull master #14
- aodh gnocchi driver support #13
- merge #12
- Fix parsing error when Glance V2 image contains optional locations #1096
- Add cascade delete load balancer, it will delete all child objects of… #1120
- Adding device_owner and device_id support for Port #1119
- add detach method to blockstorage api #1106
- merge #11
- Fix octavia pool update session_persistence with value "null" #1099
- Update volume bootable status #1098
- [issue 1094] Fix NPEs caused by okhttp HttpExecutorServiceImpl #1095
- add rescue server status #1100
- fix(secret): fix wrong representation of Secret values & add payload #1088
- Switch to standalone snakeyaml #1092
- Support Availability zones API in Neutron. #1086

name: 3.1.0 Release
body:
Enhancements:

- Added API for Octavia #1081
- Feature/barbican secret #1080
- Support multiattach property in volume #1079
- Fix in ServiceTypeEnum #1078
- Allow identity V3 to lookup service by name #1077
- fix Firewall policy param cannot be updated #1074
- Issue : #[1070](https://github.com/ContainX/openstack4j/issues/1070) #1072
- Fix ETag header to match documented name: 'Etag' #1062
- Allow value to be object type in ServiceConfig #1061
- Update builder to set old deprecated fields to support volume creation (preserving name and description) for cinder API V1 #1058
- Added a new method createSnapshot() to invoke create image action API with metadata properties #1056
- Mistral: add workflow environment and cron trigger endpoint #1055
- Adding limit to SampleCriteria for Ceilometer APIs #1052
- 928 ceilometer statistics date parsing #1049
- Renamed CinderVolume properties to be compatible with block storage API v2, fixed broken VolumeTests #1046
- Mistral: implement endpoints for action definitions and workbook definitions #1039
- Added missing fields in Magnum bay #1034
- Fix cinder volume snapshot #1031
- Add additional properties of the availability zone hint for the network. #1030
- Fix NeutronExtraDhcpOptCreate #1029
- Fix cpu info in hypervisor #1028
- update guava version to 20.0 #1021
- Api for glance image cache, list cached #1020
- cherry-picking #932 #1017
- Override equal and hashcode method of some Neutron classes #1015
- Mistral client: workflow definitions #1009
- Add http headers for supporting keystone tokenless #1002
- Cannot create HostAggregate #932

Closed bugs:

- Fix in ServiceTypeEnum #1078
- Wrong return type of disable/enable service actions #1076
- fix  Firewall policy param cannot be updated #1074
- fix unscoped token authentication #1066
- NullPointer exception when use only token authentication #1065
- Fix cinder volume snapshot #1031
- Fix NeutronExtraDhcpOptCreate #1029
- Fix cpu info in hypervisor #1028
- Fix UntrustedSSL SSLVerificationDisabled may cause NullPointerException #1026
- deserialize error when get hypervisor's info . #1012
- Cannot create HostAggregate #932
False {"message":"Not Found","documentation_url":"https://developer.github.com/v3"}

name: 3.0.4 Release
body:
Implemented enhancements:
- Add additional properties of block device mapping api v2 #989
- Allow Port Creation in Bulk #988
- Allow passing additional properties for Glance V2 #986
- Fix for correcting return result type in Magnum Container APIs #984
- add security group and rules filterable list method #981
- Implement Security Group Update API & Support Enable DHCP #978
- support ipv6 properties in subnet again #976
- Allow set ID when creating image #972
- Extended OS4J to support OpenStack Magnum Service APIs #969
- support Blockstorage Service List #968
- Adding neutron port binding data support. #967
- Neutron Port implementation does not support port binding extension #966
- Fixing port name list option. #965
- support ipv6 properties in subnet #964
- PortListOptions with port name is not working #963
- add public host property getter #962
- Change date-time format in Sahara API to ISO 8601 #961
- issue 957: run as non-root user in docker #959
- Issue 944: etag support in os.objectStorage().objects().get() #958
- DownloadImage test failure in ImageV2Tests.java #957
- add missed 'os-vol-host-attr:host' property on CinderVolume #952
- Parsing error while listing clusters : Failed to parse Date value #948
- add Evacuate Server (evacuate Action) #931
- OS4J client for Openstack Glare #926
- Add api for nova service list #914
- Trove Update #910
- Openstack telemetry aodh support #900
- support snapshot_id in volume backups #898
- api added with server id as input #883
- use Long insead of Integer in class GlanceImage #876


Fixed bugs:
- issue 957: run as non-root user in docker #959
- DownloadImage test failure in ImageV2Tests.java #957
- Fix get console output not working with Resteasy connector (#795) #949
- Parsing error while listing clusters : Failed to parse Date value #948
- fix domain null pointer exception #947
- Bug #913: add SSLContext and HostnameVerifier to hashCode and equals #923
- Issue 903 remove last route #917
- SSLContext/HostnameVerifier change in org.openstack4j.core.transport.Config is ignored #913
- Unable to remove the last route from the Router #903
- Sahara response date-time stamps cause exception #432
- Error reading entity from input stream #423 

Merged PRs:

- Add additional properties of block device mapping api v2 #989
- Allow Port Creation in Bulk #988
- Allow passing additional properties for Glance V2 #986
- Fix for correcting return result type in Magnum Container APIs #984
- add security group and rules filterable list method #981
- Implement Security Group Update API & Support Enable DHCP #978
- support ipv6 properties in subnet again #976
- Allow set ID when creating image #972
- Extended OS4J to support OpenStack Magnum Service APIs #969
- support Blockstorage Service List #968
- Adding neutron port binding data support. #967
- Fixing port name list option. #965
- support ipv6 properties in subnet #964
- add public host property getter #962
- Change date-time format in Sahara API to ISO 8601 #961
- issue 957: run as non-root user in docker #959
- Issue 944: etag support in os.objectStorage().objects().get() #958
- support updating enabledhcp in subnet #953
- add missed 'os-vol-host-attr:host' property on CinderVolume #952
- Fix get console output not working with Resteasy connector (#795) #949
- fix domain null pointer exception #947
- added unit test readme #945
- add Evacuate Server (evacuate Action) #931
- OS4J client for Openstack Glare #926
- Bug #913: add SSLContext and HostnameVerifier to hashCode and equals #923
- Issue 903 remove last route #917 
- Add api for nova service list #914
- Trove update #910 
- Kept the portsecurityenabled property as undefined #904 
- Openstack telemetry aodh support #900 
- support snapshot_id in volume backups #898 
- Implement close method in the okhttp HttpResponseImpl to avoid leak #894 
- Issue #890 - Enforce build requirement of Maven version 3.0+ #891 
- api added with server id as input # 883
- use Long insead of Integer in class GlanceImage #876 
- Include the EndpointURLResolver in the services defined in the #862
- SenlinNodeService: details about physical object that backs the node #1001 
- designate v2 service #1011

name: 3.0.3 Release
body:
**Implemented enhancements:**
- List Flavors doesn't support query parameters [#867](https://github.com/ContainX/openstack4j/issues/867)
- the NeutronFloatingIP class miss the status property [#864](https://github.com/ContainX/openstack4j/issues/864)
- the return values of getting details of keypair are incomplete [#860](https://github.com/ContainX/openstack4j/issues/860)
- the server api does not support tag? [#859](https://github.com/ContainX/openstack4j/issues/859)
- router_ids is missing from NeutronFirewall [#857](https://github.com/ContainX/openstack4j/issues/857)
- BasicActions  missed the action:"forceDelete" [#849](https://github.com/ContainX/openstack4j/issues/849)
- Class AuthIdentity doesnot implements the Serializable interface [#817](https://github.com/ContainX/openstack4j/issues/817)
- Can't create flavor with isPublic attribute in version 3.0.2 [#809](https://github.com/ContainX/openstack4j/issues/809)
- OSClientV3 does not contain the data of x-openstack-request-id [#802](https://github.com/ContainX/openstack4j/issues/802)
- UserService in Identity V3 lacked the "changePassword" method [#797](https://github.com/ContainX/openstack4j/issues/797)
- KeystoneRole in Identity V3 lacked the "domain_id" property [#796](https://github.com/ContainX/openstack4j/issues/796)
- Support for Tacker - NFV Orchestration - Version 1.0 Implementation [#786](https://github.com/ContainX/openstack4j/issues/786)
- Cinder: Missing a Feature of getting backend storage info [#762](https://github.com/ContainX/openstack4j/issues/762)
- add missing @JsonProperty in NeutronLbPoolV2Update [#873](https://github.com/ContainX/openstack4j/pull/873) ([emjburns](https://github.com/emjburns))
- add filteringParams on flavor list method [#868](https://github.com/ContainX/openstack4j/pull/868) ([whaon](https://github.com/whaon))
- add missing propety: status [#866](https://github.com/ContainX/openstack4j/pull/866) ([whaon](https://github.com/whaon))
- add missing attributes in Keypair issue:#860 [#861](https://github.com/ContainX/openstack4j/pull/861) ([whaon](https://github.com/whaon))
- Fix #857 - router_ids is missing from NeutronFirewall [#858](https://github.com/ContainX/openstack4j/pull/858) ([liranyogev](https://github.com/liranyogev))
- Idv3 updates [#853](https://github.com/ContainX/openstack4j/pull/853) ([auhlig](https://github.com/auhlig))
- make some classes implement the Serializable interface [#852](https://github.com/ContainX/openstack4j/pull/852) ([whaon](https://github.com/whaon))
- fix enhancement issue #802 [#851](https://github.com/ContainX/openstack4j/pull/851) ([whaon](https://github.com/whaon))
- Add missing action for BasicActions [#850](https://github.com/ContainX/openstack4j/pull/850) ([zizhongwei](https://github.com/zizhongwei))
- Murano API: Implementing actions API [#843](https://github.com/ContainX/openstack4j/pull/843) ([nmakhotkin](https://github.com/nmakhotkin))
- Murano API: implementing deployments [#841](https://github.com/ContainX/openstack4j/pull/841) ([nmakhotkin](https://github.com/nmakhotkin))
- Adding api endpoints for resources to heat api [#840](https://github.com/ContainX/openstack4j/pull/840) ([drmaas](https://github.com/drmaas))
- App catalog/Murano API support [#836](https://github.com/ContainX/openstack4j/pull/836) ([nmakhotkin](https://github.com/nmakhotkin))
- Nova Host service, model and describe API [#821](https://github.com/ContainX/openstack4j/pull/821) ([biogerm](https://github.com/biogerm))
- fix NovaFlavor , add @JsonIgnore to Boolean isPublic() [#820](https://github.com/ContainX/openstack4j/pull/820) ([zizhongwei](https://github.com/zizhongwei))
- Whaon patch issue 802 [#819](https://github.com/ContainX/openstack4j/pull/819) ([whaon](https://github.com/whaon))
- Added Tacker Vnf - Attributes  & TackerError Propagation.. [#814](https://github.com/ContainX/openstack4j/pull/814) ([vishvesh](https://github.com/vishvesh))
- Flavor Ephemeral support [#813](https://github.com/ContainX/openstack4j/pull/813) ([biogerm](https://github.com/biogerm))
- Addition of Glance image V2 [#810](https://github.com/ContainX/openstack4j/pull/810) ([emjburns](https://github.com/emjburns))
- Add Neutron agent-list [#807](https://github.com/ContainX/openstack4j/pull/807) ([biogerm](https://github.com/biogerm))
- Add missing method for user service [#803](https://github.com/ContainX/openstack4j/pull/803) ([zizhongwei](https://github.com/zizhongwei))
- Add missing property for KeystoneRole [#800](https://github.com/ContainX/openstack4j/pull/800) ([zizhongwei](https://github.com/zizhongwei))
- Add missing api for cinder [#791](https://github.com/ContainX/openstack4j/pull/791) ([biogerm](https://github.com/biogerm))
- Support for Tacker  - NFV Orchestration - Version 1.0 Implementation [#785](https://github.com/ContainX/openstack4j/pull/785) ([vishvesh](https://github.com/vishvesh))

**Fixed bugs:**
- Incompatible change in NovaKeypair [#869](https://github.com/ContainX/openstack4j/issues/869)
- KeystoneAuth does not have a default constructor [#838](https://github.com/ContainX/openstack4j/issues/838)
- NovaFlavor have a wrong get : Boolean isPublic() [#818](https://github.com/ContainX/openstack4j/issues/818)
- fix json mapping for subnetId [#871](https://github.com/ContainX/openstack4j/pull/871) ([atkinart](https://github.com/atkinart))
- fix issue:869 [#870](https://github.com/ContainX/openstack4j/pull/870) ([whaon](https://github.com/whaon))
- Fix #856 - add @JsonProperty to NeutronLbPoolV2 sessionPersistance [#865](https://github.com/ContainX/openstack4j/pull/865) ([emjburns](https://github.com/emjburns))
- KeystoneAuth does not have a default constructor #838 [#848](https://github.com/ContainX/openstack4j/pull/848) ([whaon](https://github.com/whaon))
- Fix #825 - NullPointerException in HttpClient connector [#826](https://github.com/ContainX/openstack4j/pull/826) ([olivierlemasle](https://github.com/olivierlemasle))

**Closed issues:**
- Identity functionality doesn't work - Returning empty lists and sending the request to the wrong endpoint. [#885](https://github.com/ContainX/openstack4j/issues/885)
- Authentication error: Unable to respond to any of these challenges [#884](https://github.com/ContainX/openstack4j/issues/884)
- Object Storage copy method - Content-Length header already present [#872](https://github.com/ContainX/openstack4j/issues/872)
- param 'sessionPersistence' of NeutronLbPoolV2 requires @JsonProperty [#856](https://github.com/ContainX/openstack4j/issues/856)
- OpenStack4j v3.0.2 with javax.ws.rs-api 2.0.1 and resteasy [#835](https://github.com/ContainX/openstack4j/issues/835)
- reboot action and hard-reboot action [#833](https://github.com/ContainX/openstack4j/issues/833)
- TestNG      No OpenStack4j connector [#832](https://github.com/ContainX/openstack4j/issues/832)
- Does OpenStack4j supports a creation of a manifest of a Static Large Object? [#831](https://github.com/ContainX/openstack4j/issues/831)
- change token [#827](https://github.com/ContainX/openstack4j/issues/827)
- NullPointerException for HEAD request with HttpClient connector [#825](https://github.com/ContainX/openstack4j/issues/825)
- Cannot retrieve metadata [#816](https://github.com/ContainX/openstack4j/issues/816)
- Listing projects with OSClientV3 resolves to "/v2.0/projects" GET request [#811](https://github.com/ContainX/openstack4j/issues/811)
- can not build the identity v2 User with Builders.user() [#794](https://github.com/ContainX/openstack4j/issues/794)
- 404 - Path /org/pacesys/openstack4j/3.0.2-SNAPSHOT/ not found [#792](https://github.com/ContainX/openstack4j/issues/792)
- server list details so slow [#790](https://github.com/ContainX/openstack4j/issues/790)
- oSClientV2 .identity().users().list() oSClientV2 .identity().tenants().list()  return empty list [#788](https://github.com/ContainX/openstack4j/issues/788)
- get network list is connection time out.  [#780](https://github.com/ContainX/openstack4j/issues/780)
- try to connect to openStack from webserver and get ClientResponseException{message=Target service not allowed, status=403, status-code=FORBIDDEN} [#769](https://github.com/ContainX/openstack4j/issues/769)
- v2: os.identity().tenants().list(), v3:os.identity().projects().list(), return a empty list [#751](https://github.com/ContainX/openstack4j/issues/751)
- Unable to retrieve current session. Please verify thread has a current session available. [#745](https://github.com/ContainX/openstack4j/issues/745)
- os.identity().users().list()      return empty list [#742](https://github.com/ContainX/openstack4j/issues/742)
- cannot get Tenants , or project  [#653](https://github.com/ContainX/openstack4j/issues/653)
- Switch to slf4j as only logging implementation [#556](https://github.com/ContainX/openstack4j/issues/556)
- ConnectionException in os.telemetry().meters().list() [#338](https://github.com/ContainX/openstack4j/issues/338)
- Is there any plan for trove support? [#299](https://github.com/ContainX/openstack4j/issues/299)

name: 3.0.2 Release
body:
**Implemented enhancements:**
- I would like to add Senlin module to the project. [#684](https://github.com/ContainX/openstack4j/issues/684)
- Is there any plan for Compute API v2.1 support? [#374](https://github.com/ContainX/openstack4j/issues/374)
- Adding Networking Lbaas V2 support [#761](https://github.com/ContainX/openstack4j/pull/761) ([emjburns](https://github.com/emjburns))
- Add Senlin module [#680](https://github.com/ContainX/openstack4j/pull/680) ([L-I-O-N](https://github.com/L-I-O-N))
- Dividing Builder-API by Identity version [#675](https://github.com/ContainX/openstack4j/pull/675) ([auhlig](https://github.com/auhlig))

**Fixed bugs:**
- Identity v2 change password will result in user being disabled [#744](https://github.com/ContainX/openstack4j/issues/744)
- 3.0.0 version DefaultAPIProvider bug [#679](https://github.com/ContainX/openstack4j/issues/679)
- 3.0.0 version get tenants return null. [#668](https://github.com/ContainX/openstack4j/issues/668)
- 3.0.0 version cannot create V2 tenant [#666](https://github.com/ContainX/openstack4j/issues/666)
- 3.0.0 NullPointerException on TokenService.check() with unscoped authentication [#623](https://github.com/ContainX/openstack4j/issues/623)
- ERROR: Root name 'quotas' does not match expected ('quota') [#602](https://github.com/ContainX/openstack4j/issues/602)
- Cannot create Flavors [#573](https://github.com/ContainX/openstack4j/issues/573)
- Flavor issue [#686](https://github.com/ContainX/openstack4j/pull/686) ([vinodborole](https://github.com/vinodborole))
- Add binding for BlockQuotaSetService [#685](https://github.com/ContainX/openstack4j/pull/685) ([vinodborole](https://github.com/vinodborole))
- Fix #635: Do not propagate null response header from http-connector [#674](https://github.com/ContainX/openstack4j/pull/674) ([olivergondza](https://github.com/olivergondza))
- Metering Service Issue #672 [#631](https://github.com/ContainX/openstack4j/pull/631) ([cbergamasco](https://github.com/cbergamasco))

**Closed issues:**
- Identity v3 with scopeToProject(Identifier.byName(projectName)) [#776](https://github.com/ContainX/openstack4j/issues/776)
- <classifier>withdeps</classifier> cause conflict between jars [#770](https://github.com/ContainX/openstack4j/issues/770)
- which openstack version is openstack4j 2.0.9 used [#758](https://github.com/ContainX/openstack4j/issues/758)
- Exception in thread "main" AuthenticationException{message=Unauthorized, status=401} [#741](https://github.com/ContainX/openstack4j/issues/741)
- Support extra field in project API. [#734](https://github.com/ContainX/openstack4j/issues/734)
- Support role assingment list API [#733](https://github.com/ContainX/openstack4j/issues/733)
- Reusing Openstack4J Infrastructure [#723](https://github.com/ContainX/openstack4j/issues/723)
- Error with osclient.compute().images.list() with identity endpoint v3 BUT is working fine with v2 [#722](https://github.com/ContainX/openstack4j/issues/722)
- os.share().schedulerStats().pools() always returns empty list [#719](https://github.com/ContainX/openstack4j/issues/719)
- openstack4j-3.0.0.jar get os error [#717](https://github.com/ContainX/openstack4j/issues/717)
- openstack host information??? [#716](https://github.com/ContainX/openstack4j/issues/716)
- server create bug [#711](https://github.com/ContainX/openstack4j/issues/711)
- Integration Test [#709](https://github.com/ContainX/openstack4j/issues/709)
- failing build [#707](https://github.com/ContainX/openstack4j/issues/707)
- PUT operation disrupt objects in case re-authentication is done [#706](https://github.com/ContainX/openstack4j/issues/706)
- Warning when creating a bucket [#703](https://github.com/ContainX/openstack4j/issues/703)
- Fully support v2 of Telemetry API [#701](https://github.com/ContainX/openstack4j/issues/701)
- Support id in CeilometerSample [#700](https://github.com/ContainX/openstack4j/issues/700)
- openstack4j.com no longer points to OpenStack4j web page [#699](https://github.com/ContainX/openstack4j/issues/699)
- 3.0.1-SNAPSHOT DefaultAPIProvider bug [#698](https://github.com/ContainX/openstack4j/issues/698)
- getEndpoints v3 [#695](https://github.com/ContainX/openstack4j/issues/695)
- get projects list not working with openstack4j-3.0.0 [#694](https://github.com/ContainX/openstack4j/issues/694)
- System Test/Unit Test [#692](https://github.com/ContainX/openstack4j/issues/692)
- Connection timeout with openstack4j Identity Query [#691](https://github.com/ContainX/openstack4j/issues/691)
- PATH_TENANTS in ClientConstants is wrong [#687](https://github.com/ContainX/openstack4j/issues/687)
- Creating flavor omits json with extra null fields [#682](https://github.com/ContainX/openstack4j/issues/682)
- 3.0.0 version tenants uri bug [#677](https://github.com/ContainX/openstack4j/issues/677)
- JKD1.7  [#673](https://github.com/ContainX/openstack4j/issues/673)
- Networks Metering Service [#672](https://github.com/ContainX/openstack4j/issues/672)
- Does openstack4j-jersey2-jdk16 version 3.0.0 exist? [#667](https://github.com/ContainX/openstack4j/issues/667)
- Search API Access? [#665](https://github.com/ContainX/openstack4j/issues/665)
- scopeToProject requests are incorrect (3.0.0-SNAPSHOT) [V3 identity API] [#664](https://github.com/ContainX/openstack4j/issues/664)
- cannot create server  [#660](https://github.com/ContainX/openstack4j/issues/660)
- change user password [#658](https://github.com/ContainX/openstack4j/issues/658)
- Grant global role to user and Grant roles to user on tenant [#657](https://github.com/ContainX/openstack4j/issues/657)
- The server's host is null which is return by the api"ServerServiceImpl.get(id)" [#656](https://github.com/ContainX/openstack4j/issues/656)
- Dose support retrieve the admin password (Windows) [#654](https://github.com/ContainX/openstack4j/issues/654)
- cannot get server's image info when server's status is error [#652](https://github.com/ContainX/openstack4j/issues/652)
- create tenant return null, why? [#648](https://github.com/ContainX/openstack4j/issues/648)
- Does Identity API support Keystone V3? [#645](https://github.com/ContainX/openstack4j/issues/645)
- NPE if there is no Content-Length in headers for HEAD responce [#643](https://github.com/ContainX/openstack4j/issues/643)
- Why getEndpoints function in ServiceWrapper class just return an empty list? [#641](https://github.com/ContainX/openstack4j/issues/641)
- Keystone V3 API endpoints not supported [#634](https://github.com/ContainX/openstack4j/issues/634)
- how to get securitygroups of a server? [#633](https://github.com/ContainX/openstack4j/issues/633)
- UpdateTemproraryKey for specific container [#628](https://github.com/ContainX/openstack4j/issues/628)
- DLPayloadEntity#writeToFile(...) doesn't close entity input stream [#622](https://github.com/ContainX/openstack4j/issues/622)
- Add update readonly flag support [#618](https://github.com/ContainX/openstack4j/issues/618)
- Class Confict in android studio dependency gradle [#617](https://github.com/ContainX/openstack4j/issues/617)
- Tenants and roles empty [#616](https://github.com/ContainX/openstack4j/issues/616)
- httpclient connector doesn't support PATCH calls [#600](https://github.com/ContainX/openstack4j/issues/600)
- Create a new Server Snapshot  [#586](https://github.com/ContainX/openstack4j/issues/586)
- any plan to support lbaas v2.0? [#585](https://github.com/ContainX/openstack4j/issues/585)
- Problem with getting specific tenant by ID [#578](https://github.com/ContainX/openstack4j/issues/578)
- "Mapping image to local is not supported" error is returned by OpenStack when boot index is specified [#567](https://github.com/ContainX/openstack4j/issues/567)
- Jersey warnings on container creation [#557](https://github.com/ContainX/openstack4j/issues/557)
- Create new server with specified volume type in block device mapping [#552](https://github.com/ContainX/openstack4j/issues/552)
- SwiftClient for Ceph [#542](https://github.com/ContainX/openstack4j/issues/542)
- RestEasy Connector (2.3.7-Final) ClientResponseFailure [#530](https://github.com/ContainX/openstack4j/issues/530)
- Listing regions for Service endpoints throws 404 error [#526](https://github.com/ContainX/openstack4j/issues/526)
- Upgrades of 3rd party dependencies [#523](https://github.com/ContainX/openstack4j/issues/523)
- domain user list [#520](https://github.com/ContainX/openstack4j/issues/520)
- os-quota-sets URI has the project id twice. (v3_collaboration) [#519](https://github.com/ContainX/openstack4j/issues/519)
- Cannot add ephemeral disk with os.compute().flavors().create(); [#514](https://github.com/ContainX/openstack4j/issues/514)
- Error calling nova, glance with v3 authentication [#512](https://github.com/ContainX/openstack4j/issues/512)
- AuthenticationException{message=Unauthorized, status=401} [#510](https://github.com/ContainX/openstack4j/issues/510)
- How to update a flavor? [#509](https://github.com/ContainX/openstack4j/issues/509)
- os.identity().users().list() return a empty list [#484](https://github.com/ContainX/openstack4j/issues/484)
- .containers ().List () os.objectStorage () API returns the number of objects in the container, the size of the object, is two times the actual value [#482](https://github.com/ContainX/openstack4j/issues/482)
- JSON is deserialized haphazardly [#478](https://github.com/ContainX/openstack4j/issues/478)
- Keystone V3 error when getting users or project list with a admin role user, Openstack4j version 2.0.5 [#477](https://github.com/ContainX/openstack4j/issues/477)
- Instance password on Windows from .pem [#465](https://github.com/ContainX/openstack4j/issues/465)
- Setting resource limits for a flavor [#456](https://github.com/ContainX/openstack4j/issues/456)
- Support for Group Based policy from Openstack KILO in Openstack4j Libraries [#453](https://github.com/ContainX/openstack4j/issues/453)
- how can I use volume snapshot create a volume? [#452](https://github.com/ContainX/openstack4j/issues/452)
- Quotaset folating ip number is not correct [#449](https://github.com/ContainX/openstack4j/issues/449)
- How to add Script  to an instance when creating it? [#442](https://github.com/ContainX/openstack4j/issues/442)
- how to extends the size of a specified volume to a new size  [#435](https://github.com/ContainX/openstack4j/issues/435)
- Add floating IP to the server [#421](https://github.com/ContainX/openstack4j/issues/421)
- How to create a tenant in a domain? [#408](https://github.com/ContainX/openstack4j/issues/408)
- Connection leak from re-authentication in HttpExecutorServiceImpl.invokeReuqest() [#400](https://github.com/ContainX/openstack4j/issues/400)
- Reference to Issue: Connect openstack server remotely using ssh tunnel time out due to endpoint changes #192  [#384](https://github.com/ContainX/openstack4j/issues/384)
- Retrieving Heat Stack outputs [#378](https://github.com/ContainX/openstack4j/issues/378)
- how to use compute extensions? [#371](https://github.com/ContainX/openstack4j/issues/371)
- Can only hold one OSClient in memory at a time [#339](https://github.com/ContainX/openstack4j/issues/339)
- os.heat().resources().show() return an object with null attributes [#304](https://github.com/ContainX/openstack4j/issues/304)
- how can I get all tenants volumes by admin role? [#303](https://github.com/ContainX/openstack4j/issues/303)
- Exception not caught while creating floating-ip. [#302](https://github.com/ContainX/openstack4j/issues/302)
- Toggle Enabled State :Modify the user whether to enable the results is to let user disable [#197](https://github.com/ContainX/openstack4j/issues/197)
- got error 409 [#194](https://github.com/ContainX/openstack4j/issues/194)
- Unable to invoke request - connection still allocated. [#133](https://github.com/ContainX/openstack4j/issues/133)

name: 3.0.0 Release
body:
This is a major milestone release which was driven and lead by @auhlig and @dhague. Special thanks for their major contributions and making this release possible.

As a result we have added 2.0-maintenance branch which is the path to EOL for OpenStack4j 2.0.X series.

## Release Notes

### Breaking Changes
- Java 8 as minimum - therefore dropping support for Jersey2-jdk16 connector
- Upgraded Jackson to 2.7.3
- SLF4j 1.7.21 as sole logging implementation

### Misc
- Introduced Groovy tests written in Groovy using Betamax to record and replay client-server communication
- Clean split of the implementation by Identity version:
- Package names reflect different  versions (_.identity.v2._ and _.identity.v3._ )
- Instead of the old version-mixed OSClient a OSClientV2 for only Identity V2 API and OSClientV3 for only Identity V3 API are available
- Same refactoring for the OSClientSession: introducing new OSClientSessionV2 and OSClientV3

body:

name: 2.0.0 Release
body:
##### Enhancements/Improvements
- Issue #155 - Add flag to allow for Legacy endpoint handling (has broken some users)

- Issue #152 - Add ability to dynamically change Endpoint URL for NAT Firewalls

- Issue #87 - Software Configuration support for HEAT
- Issue #85 - Support for os-migrations extension
- Issue #83 - Live server migration
- Issue #79 - Support for OKHttp connector
- Issue #77 - Log4j and SLF4j Plugin support
- Issue #71 - Support for other connector choices (Jersey2, Resteasy, HttpClient)
- Issue #70 - Upgrade Jersey from 2.0 to 2.10.1
- Issue #69 - Break out our current connector (Jersey) into a sub-module to offer various connector choices
- Issue #67 - Upgrade Jackson 1 to Jackson 2
- Issue #33 - Ability to specify a custom socket factory and host name verifier

##### Fixes
- Issue #148 - Compute: Creating a keypair without specifying public key does not return auto-created private key
- Issue #147 - API version is not set in service URL when using HTTPS
- Issue #146 - Bad request when using HTTPS
- Issue #142 - Creating a volume from ImageRef returns volume object without populating original reference

- Issue #134 - JDK 1.6 compatibility support option with Jersey 2 connector
- Issue #131 - Regression: Error adding a floating IP
- Issue #130 - NPE when creating a new Network
- Issue #129 - Unable to add a user to a tenant using RestEasy connector

- Issue #117 - SecGroupExtension.Rule.IPProtocol can be null instead of ANY or UNRECOGNIZED
- Issue #116 - Some methods in Service classes return void instead of ActionResponse
- Issue #115 - Method waitForServerStatus throws NPE
- Issue #113 - Return value for deallocateIP is void instead of ActionResponse
- Issue #111 - Writer errors when using the resteasy-connector
- Issue #106 - ActionResponse status is incorrect for addFloatingIP
- Issue #103 - Issue when updating a port in network
- Issue #97 - Yaml based template ignored in Stack creation
- Issue #95 - Easy determination within an Image to determine if it's a snapshot of a volume
- Issue #93 - Error listing images (Error reading entity from input stream)
- Issue #92 - Problems in deserializing an object (Heat Stack)
- Issue #91 - Implementation of the method "getHosts()" in the class availabilityZoneList
- Issue #90 - Volume Status "downloading" not regonized
- Issue #75 - NPE in NeutronNetwork
- Issue #20 - Glance - creating a large image throws out of memory error

body:
Heat Orchestration Support
Issue #65 - Instance rebuild with options support

Issue #5, #47 PR - Availability Zones listing

name: 1.0.1 RELEASE
body:
Features
- Block Storage (Cinder) support
- Floating IP/Pools support in Compute
- VNC and Console Output support in Compute -> Servers
- Personality support on Compute -> Server -> Create
- Security Group & Rules in Compute
- Keypair support
- Floating IP in Network
- Security Groups & Rules in Network
- Telemetry (Ceilometer) support
- Untrusted SSL Certificate trust (handy for dev environments) [Issue #13]

Fixes 
- Issue #8, Issue #9, Issue #10
